Reviews.Title: The one I should have gotten first !
Reviews.Author: Dane Shepherd
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera after returning the fifty-dollar plastic 'indoor' model with audio.  This unit feels VERY solidly built and performs great.  The night vision is clear and bright at greater than 20 feet.  The picture is sharp and accurate (though I lose a lot of quality going through my Q-See MPEG capture card).  The wide field of vision is excellent (there is a bit of 'fish-eye', but I don't know how you'd avoid that with a nearly 90 degree range).  These do not look ridiculous or obvious mounted to my home.  One camera covers about 80% of my backyard and another mounted above my front door monitors guests, delivery personnel, solicitors, and occasionally nocturnal predators (lots of geckos in Florida.)  I highly recommend this camera, particularly for domestic applications where appearance might be a concern.  BEAR IN MIND; this unit did NOT include power or cabling.  If you are planning more than one camera I strongly recommend purchasing an AC adapter intended for 4 or 8 units, vs getting a module for each device.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!!
Reviews.Author: R. James
Reviews.Content: I purchased two of these cameras and it is in great condition and the price was amazing. I had been searching for a dome camera and this one had everything I could ask for. Great picture quality and the night vision is amazingly clear. I was skeptical at buying two at first but I am glad I did! This camera is a must buy!! The camera has great durability and it is sturdy. The camera is also very nice for domestic areas because they don't look very obvious mounted on buildings outside. No complaints here!!

Reviews.Title: A good camera for the price.
Reviews.Author: zerotsm "zero"
Reviews.Content: This is a very good camera for the price.  I bought two of these to replace older black and white cameras that got damaged in a thunderstorm.  The performance in total darkness is excellent.  However, to get good color, the scene must be brightly lit, otherwise the IR diodes stay "on" and the colors are washed out.  There is also a tendency to white compression on both of my samples under certain lighting conditions, this is why I gave this product only 4 stars. However this camera is adequate as a fixed security camera.

Reviews.Title: Incorrect color, poor build quality.
Reviews.Author: S. Nelson
Reviews.Content: Purchased this to add to my CCTV setup. The camera's color was inaccurate. Blacks were blue and people's faces/eyes in daytime were pitch black. Adjusting color on the DVR could not even out the issues and the camera seemed to pick out and misrepresent certain colors. There was no option for exchange only a return. Unfortunately with most things from the land of the egg roll, you don't really know what you are buying till you get it first hand. Who knows if this is a genuine Effio chip either. Better off with CNB, Bosch, Dahua, or Pelco. More money but you get quality and a camera that works right, right out of the box.

Reviews.Title: A Fair Critique...
Reviews.Author: J. Wons
Reviews.Content: If you're new to security cameras and are setting up something for your house for the first time, I think these are a fair value.Here's the problems I had with the unit:1.  Mine did not include the power supply, even though the title (as of Oct 8 2011) indicates it comes with a power supply.  Not really a big deal since amazon will take it back and send a new one.2.  I don't believe the image quality is 600 lines.  I have a 500 line camera and the resolution is much cleaner than this one.  I have no idea how to prove this.  But an observation nonetheless (and there are too many factors that go into image quality, so I might be wrong on this).3.  This bothered me, but might not bother you; the LED's glow red, and it's a definite, noticeable red at night.  My other security camera made by a different manufacturer have LEDs and they do not glow red (see my comment below - they do glow a little).  From what I read, glowing red LED's are slightly older technology and are inexpensive (hence why they use them).But trying the camera is risk free as Amazon will take the product back if you don't like it.  It was worth a shot and you might like it and think I'm being too picky given the price of this camera.

Reviews.Title: Not worth the money
Reviews.Author: Reviewer76
Reviews.Content: After purchasing two of the 420TVL version of this camera, I thought getting this one (listed at 700TVL) would be a great step up in quality and clarity.  This was not the case.  Under certain lighting conditions, there was a very slight improvement in picture quality, but in others the image was actually more blurry.  The night vision was about the same, except when in the direct path of the IR.  Because this camera has 8 more LEDs than the 420 version, anything that passes directly in the center of the picture is completely unrecognizable; it's a pure white blur.  This camera is also considerably larger physically, making it much more noticable when mounted on the house.  Having spent an extra $50 over the 420, this camera was a total dissapointment and not worth the money.  I have reinstalled the 420, and have not yet found an application for this camera.  Just like the 420, neither the camera nor the power supply for the 700 are UL listed.  I would not recommend this camera since you can buy a better functioning camera for less than half the price.

Reviews.Title: VideoSecu Security Camera
Reviews.Author: L. mccarty "Mac"
Reviews.Content: Pretty good camera.  Will white out when sun is bright.  Has very good night vision.  Day clarity is good for about thirty feet. Automobiles are recognizable by brand at 100 feet in daylight.

Reviews.Title: Good for the money
Reviews.Author: MPB West Hills
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because someone ripped my $200 camera off my house and clipped the wire. I don't think they'll be able to get this one so easily. It mounts flush to the side of my house, no bracket sticking out to hang on and pull down. It's not vandal proof but much better than a normal camera. It's a lot less noticeable than a standard mounted camera. The quality is mid-range. Its a little grainy, but better than a 420 TV Line camera. The night vision is very good in my opinion for this price range. The wide angle view is helpful. Installation was easy, but make sure you don't tighten the locking ring until you're sure the camera is pointing where you want it. What makes it vandal-resistant is also what makes it hard to adjust later.

Reviews.Title: Love This Camera
Reviews.Author: JohnR
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. It's way better than cameras I got a few years ago for twice the price. There seems to have been a leap ahead in quality/ability of these low end cameras lately and this on is on the good side of that. I'm not sure how my old vendor with the same old product line expects to stay in business.

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: jason m
Reviews.Content: The camera works well. Easy to install and great image. Camera works great at night. Wide angle captures my entire yard.

Reviews.Title: Bright LEDs, very good picture
Reviews.Author: Griz44Mag "Griz44Mag"
Reviews.Content: I mounted this one above my front door in the entry, and tied it into the security DVR.The picture is excellent, and even on a moonless night with the porch lights off, the picture is as bright and clear as a sunny day.It's nice to see who is at the door and to watch for those sneeky UPS and FEDEX deliveries that drop and run leaving a package on the front door step in plain view of the street.  (ARRRRRGGGGG!)I also teamed this up with the optional microphone, they make a great pair for enhancing the security of my home.

Reviews.Title: Camera died after a few months, no warranty from seller
Reviews.Author: iridium
Reviews.Content: This camera has decent video, and night vision is acceptable. After a few months, it started to flicker, then some days the picture would just be all black. If you gently tap the housing, it would flicker back on and off, sometimes staying on, other times it goes back to black. Apparently, this 89.00 camera has no kind of warranty from the seller, they ignored my request for a replacement camera. Amazon customer service, as usual, was outstanding, retuning my purchase price, including return shipping. 5 Stars to AMAZON, zero to the camera seller customer support. Shop elsewhere in Amazon for security cameras with warranties.

Reviews.Title: This CCTV Camera works great !!!
Reviews.Author: Al
Reviews.Content: The camera looks great, the construction is solid, image with 700 TVL very sharp, night vision in total darkness woks fabulous and for the price is the best that youcan get.

Reviews.Title: 3.5mm-12mm Camera
Reviews.Author: Joey
Reviews.Content: This listing has changed since the last time I ordered the camera. The cameras I bought were varifocal 3.5mm-12mm 600TVL domes. They are very clear and the zoom function is incredible. THIS REVIEW DOES NOT REFLECT THE CURRENT PRODUCT LISTED FOR SALE NOW. I have not bought the 700 TVL camera that is shown now. Cameras are changed constantly on this page and it makes it difficult to review the accurate product.

Reviews.Title: Great Bargain!
Reviews.Content: I've tried several more expensive cameras, and this one tops them all. It has better night vision capability than any other camera I've tried. The wide angle captures a lot of area.

Reviews.Title: Value for money CCTV Dome type
Reviews.Author: Yusry
Reviews.Content: I bought this product about 3 weeks ago. 480 TVL is good enough for monitoring your house area day and night. I'm happy with quality of video. I'm giving 4* because the paint is easy to peel off especially when it is contacted with hard object. Easy to set up. You must order power supply separately.

Reviews.Title: Field of vision is too narrow.
Reviews.Author: Azul
Reviews.Content: Not as sharp as I anticipated. It's cheaply made. The focus is very norrow. The camera is well shapped but, it does not provide a good picture compared to other models.

Reviews.Title: Could be better
Reviews.Author: Ryan Hansen
Reviews.Content: Fuzzy video feed, save yourself the trouble and go with a 1080P IP system.  This is ok, but it could definatly be better.

Reviews.Title: Better then the rest
Reviews.Author: Mark B. Koenig
Reviews.Content: Ok I have had a security system for 3 years now and so far these cameras are the only ones that consistently work outside. I have bought other brands, including a few that were 2 to $300 and all have failed with in a month or two. There cameras are not the easiest to adjust and mount compared to the others but they do last much longer. the more time I can spend off a ladder the better in my opinion.

Reviews.Title: Very nice camera
Reviews.Author: al
Reviews.Content: This the second one of these I have purchased and I am completely satisfied with it. I would recommend to friends.

Reviews.Title: VideoSecu Day Night Vision
Reviews.Author: Dallas, TX
Reviews.Content: Good video security camera for the price.  The assembly overall seem to be cheaply made, but I am not complaining for this price.  Although I was looking to purchase a security camera with audio, but this will do.

Reviews.Title: Totally Awesome
Reviews.Author: MLPJ
Reviews.Content: I have had an alarm system and cameras for about 12 years. This camera works better at night then the ones I paid $400.00 for. I will buy more and slowly replace all the junk ones I have. It makes all my 8 cameras look bad.

Reviews.Title: Difficult to set at a sharp angle.
Reviews.Author: gwe
Reviews.Content: This camera did not have the "tunning adjustment" others with this chip have. The design makes it difficult to get a 75 to 80 degree view setting. I think I may have used it in the wrong application. I plan to replace this camera in the near future.

Reviews.Title: amazing camera for under $100
Reviews.Author: M. Paulsen "Tech guy"
Reviews.Content: I've been using 3 of these now (coupled with a 700 tvl zoom sony 1/3 for the 4th which is just as good as these 3) for around 3+months during summer season outside the home and they work very, very well for a sub-$100 camera.  I am using them on coax, then converted to balun, run on category6, then balun, to coax, then to a q-see qt454 and they work flawlessly at over 150' of cabling with multiple media type changes.Couldn't be happier with my purchase, highly recommend.  If I remember, may update after the winter months how they fare.

Reviews.Title: Disappointing night performance
Reviews.Author: Scott
Reviews.Content: Camera works very well in daylight conditions with average light sun or basic clouds but fails miserably for night vision.  Sony should make it clear that this camera technology is not for night capture on a DVR recording or trying to view an image on a monitor.  If you did have to review a night breaking or vandalism at night you will not be able to make out images unles you ave excellent flood lights to support images.

Reviews.Title: Zoom Function
Reviews.Author: Product expert
Reviews.Content: This product good wide angle, but not a good zoom in function and hard to adjust the camera in different angles.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera - but specs say it's 420 lines NOT 480 as advertised
Reviews.Author: Mike the K
Reviews.Content: The retailer, warehouseseller, Puts a 480 line sticker on the outside of the box, but inside the box the manufacture's spec sheet says that its a 420 line camera. I've, over the last six months, bought 6 dome cameras from warehouserseller: two 420 line /w power supply; two, of the "microphone" and two of the 480 line models (power supply extra).  The manufacturer's spec sheet is the same for ALL cameras that I received.  The camera housing varies a little (pull-apart or twist (or screw) off).  The "microphone" model is just the standard camera with aseperate external microphone add-on: it looks like a 12inch siamese cable with a tiny mic wraped in tape. The "microphone" is just thrown in the box of their standard model.  As to the Videosecu label and serial, most the cameras I ordered didn't not have it, but Jenny who answers the phone (and does tech support) swears everything is good.  OK, the cameras work fine. But they should tell you what you are really getting.Mike the K

Reviews.Title: Excellent Video
Reviews.Author: Ruso Minnifield "PrinceHappy2"
Reviews.Content: Don't be fooled by the look-a-likes.  This 540 TVL has it all.  The pictures is excellent and the night view is very good.  Don't see something cheaper and think you are getting the same results.  The difference in price is worth the difference.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera!!!
Reviews.Author: Dean VanderWal
Reviews.Content: Bought one of these cameras to try and loved it. Ordered three more the day it arrived. They look nicer and work better than the cheap cameras that came with my system. I love them and my wife said the same...how often does that happen...lol

Reviews.Title: Terrible night vision.
Reviews.Author: Jay "jason_j_a"
Reviews.Content: I'm not sure why this camera got such great reviews.  The night vision on this thing is worse than the Q-See cameras that came with my DVR.  See my pictures for examples.  This camera refuses to switch over to black and white unless my outdoor lights are off even though there is clearly not enough light for this camera to operate well.  The images generated by this resulted in a grainy overcompressed mess.  If someone did do something, I would never be able to get a useful image from it.Daytime performance is fine, but that's pretty much the case for all cameras.  Night and low light is what really makes or breaks a camera, and this one fails miserably.  I would up getting a much better camera for about 30% more money.  The difference is staggering.  I suggest you check out Nelly's Surplus and take a look at some of the camera's sold there.  They will let you remotely demo some of their cameras so you can actually see how much better the image quality can be with a real camera.

Reviews.Title: Advertised at 400 lines
Reviews.Author: DAC
Reviews.Content: Advertised at 400 lines, and it is. My other are 700 and there is a difference. Nice camera though but I will get another 700 line one.

Reviews.Title: too expensive
Reviews.Author: hector pagan
Reviews.Content: no cables incudle, the original camera H960 covers more than this camera. it is a camera that comes expensive for the resuts...keep in mind you will get half of the focal view fisheye lens is different for the original.

ProductInfo.Features:
Powered by 1/3'' Sony Effio CCD technology, color DSP, automatic CDS sensor
700 TV lines high resolution, built-in 3.6mm wide view angle lens
Built-in 28 Infrared lights for night vision
Weatherproof aluminum housing for indoor and outdoor application
Power requires:12V DC 500mA power supply and bonus security warning decal included
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu Day Night Vision Built-in 1/3" Sony Effio CCD CCTV Home Video Infrared Dome Security Camera 700TVL 28 IR LEDs Vandal Proof 3.6mm Wide View Angle Lens for DVR Surveillance System with Power Supply and Free Security Warning Decal A74
